subject: re:Can't be a lover anymore?
body:
Dear customer.
This is the letter from the CanadianPharmacy. We prove that "generic" doesn't necessarily mean "expensive". If you shop for drugs online, please, read this to the end.
Can generic drugs be cheap? Sure, but only if they come from Canada. CanadianPharmacy offers you to save large without having to put your health in danger. Huge choice of qualitative generic drugs offered at the lowest prices imaginable only at CanadianPharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Yours,Katelyn Powell
